ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Carryover_After_Reset__c, "Yes"), ISBLANK(Carryover_Units__c) ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Carryover_After_Reset__c, "No"), NOT(ISBLANK(Carryover_Units__c)), Carryover_Units__c > 0 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Carryover Units must be entered when 'Carryover After Reset' is Yes, and must be left blank or zero when it is No
